questions.question: What health issues arise from polluted air according to [S1]?
questions.explanation: [S1] implies polluted air causes health concerns such as respiratory problems.

questions.question: Which of these choices improves air quality?
questions.explanation: Energy efficient vehicles improve air quality [S2].

questions.question: What are pollutants directly released into the air called?
questions.explanation: According to [S3], primary pollutants are emitted directly into the air.

questions.question: According to [S4], how do CFCs destroy ozone?
questions.explanation: [S4] explains that CFCs release chlorine atoms, which then destroy ozone molecules.

questions.question: Which gases are major contributors to acid rain?
questions.explanation: Sulfur dioxide (SO2) and nitrogen oxides (NOx) react with water to form acid rain [S5].
